programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Bucket List Qura, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll and Paddy Doherty pay a visit to the award-winning swordsmith, Matsunaga Genrokuro in the city of Arao in Kyushu, Japan. He shows them a few things about making the swords used by the Samurai, and how to wield them. They also explore some hidden Christian sites in the Nagasaki region.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Bikaner is known to most people as the city of world-famous savoury snacks. When Asmita goes there for a whirlwind trip, however, she discovers that there is a lot more to Rajasthan’s Red City than meets the eye. From the miniature paintings that can be found on the walls of palaces and mansions across the city to the elaborate architecture of the former havelis of merchants, she finds out that Bikaner is an art lover’s paradise.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Jim Corbett, India
programme.desc: Healer is upset with Rohan as he leaves him behind and goes in search of the big cats of the jungle. Rohan meets up with some villagers who stay at the edge of the tiger reserve and discusses the human-animal conflicts faced by them. At the Corbett Museum, he discovers some interesting facets of the man after whom the park was named.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Unwind Banyan Tree, Maldives
programme.desc: Indeya unwinds at the Banyan Tree resort. She tries water sports, learns a traditional Maldivian recipe, rejuvenates herself at a spa and ends her day by exploring the capital city of Male.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: For the ever-dwindling Parsi community of western India, food is both pleasure and heritage — and a secret language in danger of dying out. Eisha meets the renowned food blogger and caterer, Mehnaz Mansud, who introduces her to some of the forgotten recipes of Parsi cuisine such as Dodima Gosht, the unusual and yet sublime fusion of mutton and bottle gourd.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Off The Grid Jinka, Ethiopia
programme.desc: In Jinka, Emeline visits the Mursi and other tribes, and learns about their distinct cultures and curious traditions.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Bucket List Qura, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll and Paddy Doherty pay a visit to the award-winning swordsmith, Matsunaga Genrokuro in the city of Arao in Kyushu, Japan. He shows them a few things about making the swords used by the Samurai, and how to wield them. They also explore some hidden Christian sites in the Nagasaki region.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Unwind Banyan Tree, Maldives
programme.desc: Indeya unwinds at the Banyan Tree resort. She tries water sports, learns a traditional Maldivian recipe, rejuvenates herself at a spa and ends her day by exploring the capital city of Male.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: For the ever-dwindling Parsi community of western India, food is both pleasure and heritage — and a secret language in danger of dying out. Eisha meets the renowned food blogger and caterer, Mehnaz Mansud, who introduces her to some of the forgotten recipes of Parsi cuisine such as Dodima Gosht, the unusual and yet sublime fusion of mutton and bottle gourd.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 City Breaks Bukhara, Uzbekistan
programme.desc: One of Uzbekistan’s most ancient cities, Bukhara was a popular town even during the days of the Silk Route trading. Built atop a constellation of small oases here weary desert travelers could find water and rest. Through its madrassahs, minarets, a massive royal fortress and the remnants of a once-vast market complex, Alex Outhwaite soaks in the vibes of the Central Asia of yore.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 World Heritage Ancient Temples of Egypt, Egypt (ENG)
programme.desc: Explore the ancient heritage sites of Abu Simbel, the Philae complex of Nubia and the Hatshepsut Temple to unravel the mystical stories behind the ancient temples of Egypt.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Mukteshwar, India
programme.desc: Amidst a canopy of conifer forests and orchards, Mukteshwar sits in the lap of the Himalayas. Healer and Rohan soak in the quiet, pastoral quaintness of the region as they camp under the stars at this mountain village. They also visit Peora, a serene hamlet defined by its orchards, which has come to be known as the fruit bowl of Uttarakhand.

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Burn Appetit Riegersberg, Austria
programme.desc: On the way to Graz from Vienna, Jolly makes an unexpected discovery: a medieval castle on a volcano, which is home to a dungeon of witches.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Bucket List Kagoshima, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty visit Meiji-Gura in Kyushu, Japan, to taste a locally brewed Japanese hard liquor, Shochu. They also go to the Makurazaki region for a special meal of bonito, a Japanese seafood delicacy, prepared for them by world-class chefs, Gaggan Anand and Takeshi “Goh” Fukuyama.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Unwind Earl's Regency, Sri Lanka (ENG)
programme.desc: Successful actress and travel enthusiast, Indeya Passfield visits Kandy in search of rejuvenation. From the Zen at Sri Dalada Maligawa temple and nature therapy at Royal Forest Park in Uddawatekele to delectable Sri Lankan fare and relaxing massages at her resort, she finds it in every experience she has in Kandy. She also explores the local arts and crafts at the Kandyan Arts Association.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Off The Grid Addis Ababa, Ethiopia
programme.desc: Emeline visits Lucy and Ardi, the ancestors of mankind, and relishes traditional Ethiopian injera in Addis Ababa, the capital of Ethiopia.

programme.title: The Moroccon Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Moroccon Chronicles Eternal Love in Chefchaouen
programme.desc: Rafe visits Chefchaouen and is instantly besotted with the city, much to the confusion of the locals who are baffled by his eccentricities.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Nagthat, India
programme.desc: Uttarakhand, a state in northern India crossed by the Himalayas, is known for its Hindu pilgrimage sites. However, Rohan goes there with his travel buddy, Healer, looking for adventures. Their first stop is a small, mountain village, Nagthat, where the locals give them a unique welcome. As they set out to explore the surroundings, they chance upon a beautiful waterfall.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Quest Fort Begu 2, India
programme.desc: While the vast majority of Rajasthan’s inhabitants have always been staunch vegetarians, there has been tremendous popularity of the meat dishes in the state’s culinary culture. This came mainly from the Rajput rulers, which is why Alex meets Ajayraj Singh who comes from a royal lineage. He introduces her to the history of the valiant rulers of Mewar and some of the secret meat preparations of the kingdom

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E54 Bucket List Fukuoka, Japan
programme.desc: While the rest of Japan remained isolated from the world, Fukuoka’s global flavour was concocted by centuries of trade with its Asian neighbours. Adventurers, Daniel Coll and Paddy Doherty attend a unique baseball game at a rather offbeat stadium in Kyushu’s largest city.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 City Breaks Belfast, Ireland
programme.desc: Join our host in Belfast, as she explores a city dotted with Victorian buildings to vibrant streets. Starting from City hall to visiting RMS Titanic Museum in this episode of City Breaks.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Off The Grid Gondar, Ethiopia
programme.desc: Emeline learns about the history of Ethiopia at the Gondar Castle, and goes on to explore the stunning, rock-hewn Lalibela churches.

programme.title: The Moroccon Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Moroccon Chronicles The Ballad of Fes
programme.desc: The imperial city of Fes, with its richly evocative attractions, makes Rafe feel like he is in a movie...with a plot twist right around the corner.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Nag Tibba, India
programme.desc: Situated on the foothills of Uttarakhand’s Garhwal mountains, Nag Tibba is a popular trekking destination. At an altitude of 3100 meters above sea level, this mountain peak is believed to be the abode of the god of serpents. As Healer and Rohan embark on this trek, they pass local villages and forests, and catch breathtaking views of the Himalayas along the way.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Quest Heritage Haveli, India
programme.desc: Where many ancient Indian civilizations flourished in the most resource-filled areas, the people of Rajasthan created a powerful, complex, layered and regal culture and cuisine in the largely arid land that they called home. Alex discovers this when she meets Anjali Singh, a member of the royal family of Jaipur, who shows her how to make two prized recipes from her family’s legacy - Papad Ki Chutney and Safed Murg.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Bucket List Itoshima, Japan
programme.desc: Why do men camp in the great outdoors? Simply to get some peace and quiet. In this episode, watch Dan & Paddy’s day in Itoshima - a place with soothing waterfalls, fishing pools and perfect beach sunsets to calm the soul.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: A quick escape to Jaipur introduces Asmita to the stark contrast in the old and new sides of Rajasthan’s capital city. On the one hand, she has a tryst with the global cosmopolis that attracts business and luxury travelers from all over the world. On the other hand, the regal monuments of the region reveal to her the stories of the kings who built them.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Off The Grid Axum, Ethiopia
programme.desc: Emeline explores the ruins of Aksum, the heart of ancient Ethiopia. Next, she tries the Ethiopian coffee ceremony and hyena feeding in Harar.

programme.title: The Moroccon Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Moroccon Chronicles One Flew Over Casablanca
programme.desc: At Casablanca, Rafe draws hilarious connections between what he sees, and the 1942 Hollywood classic named after the city.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Kanatal, India
programme.desc: On a trip to explore the lesser-known sides of Uttarakhand, Rohan and Healer find themselves at Kanatal, a rustic hill retreat. Rohan attempts to get Healer off his fear of water by taking him on a boat ride on the waters of Asia’s biggest man-made lake. Later on, they meet some locals, who introduce them to Garhwali folk music.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Bihar’s rural heartland has a lot to offer the intrepid traveller. Alex meets Rajesh Ramjan, a politician, a cultural conservationist and a foodie, who shows her the beauty of Bihar’s countryside and introduces her to some traditional Bihari dishes. From dahi-chura, the Bihari breakfast of champions to flavourful preparations of fresh local vegetables simmering on a traditional stove, Alex gets an understanding of the nourishing cuisine that fuels farmers to toil in the fields all day.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Bucket List Gyokuro, Japan
programme.desc: Tea in Japan is a spiritual concept. Attaching ritual and ceremony to it, this country transforms the act of drinking tea to a moment of communion with the universe. Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty find out different ways to relish Gyokuro tea, one of the highest grades of tea available in Japan. They also visit the village where it is grown.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 1(Eng)
programme.desc: From lazing in hammocks by the beach to sipping drinks on a private yacht, Kim realizes that Maldives is the perfect destination to unwind in style.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Off The Grid Omo Valley, Ethiopia
programme.desc: In Omo Valley, Emeline visits the Hamer, Karo and Dassanach tribes, and learns about their distinct culture and curious traditions.

programme.title: The Moroccon Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Moroccon Chronicles Uncharted Marrakech
programme.desc: The evocative city of Marrakech has long provided great artists with inspiration, but will it be able to give Rafe the adventure he seeks?

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Rishikesh, India
programme.desc: The sacred city of Rishikesh is a haven for pilgrims, yogis and adventure lovers from all around the world. Healer and Rohan experience the thrill of river rafting on the spirited rapids of the holy river Ganga. After this adrenaline rush, they visit a quiet beach to cool off but are surprised and amused to see it filled with couples on pre wedding shoots.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Considered among the oldest communities in India, the Gaud Saraswat Brahmans have a culture and cuisine that is still largely unexplored. Eisha sets out to explore the lesser-known flavours of this cuisine with the renowned chef, Sudip Pai, who introduces her to some of the culinary gems of his community. While she cooks with him, she also comes to know about the beliefs and traditions that govern the cuisine and way of life of the community.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Bucket List Ohana, Japan
programme.desc: Among Japan’s best kept secrets is its very own Venice with an oriental flavour to it. Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty visit this hidden gem, and learn a little about Kyushu’s history and Samurai, the legendary Japanese warriors. They also witness an enchanting garden, that is the perfect combination of the creativity of nature and human beings.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 2(Eng)
programme.desc: An invigorating spa treatment, a cooking lesson, a snorkeling session – Kim has experiences in the Maldives that leave her completely rejuvenated.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Off The Grid Jinka, Ethiopia
programme.desc: In Jinka, Emeline visits the Mursi and other tribes, and learns about their distinct cultures and curious traditions.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 City Breaks Sofia, Bulgaria
programme.desc: Bulgaria's capital Sofia is one of Europe's most compact and walkable city, with small gardens, parks and cafes sprawled all over.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Bucket List Sakurajima, Japan
programme.desc: The name Sakurajima means cherry blossom island - and that is the beguiling name of a fuming volcano in Kyushu. Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try different ways to get up, close and personal with the volcano. What they don’t count on is an eruption.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.desc: Looking for a break from the chaos and stress of city life, Asmita decides to visit Haridwar, a place which she had last visited with her family.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Jilling Terraces, India
programme.desc: The lesser-visited Kumaon region of Uttarakhand is largely unspoiled, and boasts pleasant small towns with panoramic mountain views. In one of these small towns, Rohan sets out to take in these panoramic mountain views through paragliding. Will Healer, his partner-in-crime, be satisfied sitting on the sidelines? Or will the two of them together sail fearlessly across the skies?

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 World Spas Fusion Maia, Vietnam
programme.desc: Travel to Da Nang this week with World Spas and take a peek into the life of the pampered few.

programme.desc: In Vienna, Jolly chances upon a Baroque palace that houses mysteries of not only the world in which we live but also of the heavens above.

programme.desc: Lost F1 Teams: Prodrive

programme.title: Lost F1 Teams: Epsilon Euskadi
programme.desc: Based in the Basque Country region of Spain, Epsilon set sights on becoming the first Spanish F1 team with an entry for the 2010 season...but they never made it to the grid. Here's why.

programme.title: Why Lola Should've Made It Onto The 2010 F1 Grid
programme.desc: Founded in 1958 by Eric Broadley, Lola can trace its history in F1 back to 1962, supplying its Mk4 chassis to Reg Parnell’s privateer team, fielding British duo John Surtees and Roy Salvadori as its driving line-up. Having developed a relationship with Surtees in that time, Broadley returned to F1 to pen the works Honda team’s RA300 chassis in 1967, beginning a course of sporadic involvement over the next few decades.

programme.title: Make F1 Great Again: The US F1 Team That Never Made It Into Formula 1
programme.desc: The deadlock of American manufacturers entering F1 - having enjoyed a glut in the ‘60s and ‘70s with Eagle, Penske and, erm, Scarab – looked to have been broken sooner amid F1’s new-team tender process. Sensing an opportunity to increase F1’s exposure in America, the FIA admitted the US F1 team to the 2010 grid in its overtures to hand the Star-Spangled Banner its first exposure on the constructors’ list for nearly quarter of a decade. Set up by engineer Ken Anderson, a veteran of IndyCar – heading up the design of the G-Force car that took to the IRL’s cast of oval circuits - and ex-Williams team manager Peter Windsor, the US F1 project made its home in Charlotte, North Carolina, from...

programme.title: Lost F1 Teams: Campos
programme.desc: Lost F1 Teams: Campos

programme.title: The Valentino Rossi Story
programme.desc: An extraordinary personality, global popularity, legendary victory celebrations, and nine motorcycle world championship titles - those are the words to describe Valentino Rossi.

programme.title: Rossi's Fast Food Genius - VR46's Executive Chef Spills the Beans
programme.desc: Ever wandered what it might be like to feed a MotoGP team? We sat down with Michele Quarenghi, chef for the Pertamina Enduro VR46 Racing Team, to get a behind the scenes look at being a travelling chef in Motorsport. We ask Michele just what it takes to feed as many as 1,300 people across a race weekend, how you get into a racing paddock in the first place, the challenges of sourcing ingredients in different countries, and of course, what it's like to cook for the legend that is Valentino Rossi, and what is favourite meal is!

programme.title: Race Rewind: NASCAR Cup Series at Sonoma Raceway
programme.desc: Shane van Gisbergen, Chase Briscoe and the entire NASCAR Cup Series field at Sonoma delivered Sunday, with plenty of spin outs, wrecks and drama. Enjoy this replay of a Cup Series race that was great from start to finish.

programme.title: Dakar 1986
programme.desc: All the action from the classic Dakar Rally in 1986, from Duke Video.

programme.title: F1's Fiercest Rivalries with Karun Chandhok
programme.desc: From the personal insults of Nigel Mansell vs Nelson Piquet, the short but fiery feud between Ayrton Senna and Michael Schumacher, to a friendship turned sour between Nico Rosberg and Lewis Hamilton, they’re all featured here. But what pair takes the Number 1 spot? Autosport Editor-In-Chief Kevin Turner sits down with former driver and Sky Sports F1 broadcaster Karun Chandhok to debate who they think are the Top 10 greatest rivalries in the sport’s 75-year history. Let us know who you think F1’s greatest rivalry was in the comments, and check back soon for a new series of F1 Top 10 Podcasts!

programme.title: BRC 2025 - Round 4: Rallye De Wallonie
programme.desc: What a denouement. After Cédric Cherain dominated the race with the Porsche 992 Rally GT, the car suddenly stopped briefly on the Naninne dirt track due to an electronic fault. lost 2 minutes and Jos Verstappen did not miss the opportunity to score his third win of the season.

programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour 2024 will host the second stop of the freestyle discipline in Cauipe in north-eastern Brazil. The Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup offers intense competitions in the shallow waters.

programme.desc: The Vendée Globe wants to use the media impact of the event to raise public awareness of ocean protection during the circumnavigation. By sailing around the world, the Vendée Globe sailors are drawing attention to the fragility of our oceans.

programme.title: Engadinwing 2022
programme.desc: The second GWA Wingfoil World Tour event of the year and this week sees us in the iconic Swiss Alps for the Ensis Engadinwing by Dakine GWA Wingfoil World Cup.

programme.title: EFPT Stop #02 Vieste
programme.desc: In today´s episode, we´re going to visit the second tour stop of the European Freestyle Pro Tour 2022 in Vieste Italy. The windsurfers will show their skills on the water and will give us some water-Action in the Mediterranean Sea. Let´s check out!

programme.title: E-Bike World Tour 2022 - Flachau (AUT)
programme.desc: The E-Race at the Flachau E-Bike Festival 2022 is probably one of the most spectacular races in e-bike sport and brings an international squad of top riders to Flachau.

programme.title: FIA Karting European Champioships
programme.desc: World Champion and European Champion in Karting. The CIK-FIA presents the most up-to-date Championships which bring together the best drivers and the greatest hopefuls of motor sport of the future during races of an incredible intensity.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #28: Queen & King of the Court 2025
programme.desc: The spectacular Queen & King of the Court 2025 beach volleyball event returns to Hamburg from May 23 to 25! For the fifth time in a row, the best players in the world will compete against each other in Hamburg. Level brought to life.

programme.title: Motosurf World Championship 2024
programme.desc: MotoSurf World Championship in Croatia: This year, when the championship hosted the qualification for the World Games as part of the Championship, 109 racers representing 21 different countries and 3 continents competed in Zadar.

programme.title: Queen & King of the Court #04
programme.desc: The sands of Doha are set to witness the grand finale of the 2023 Queen & King of the Court Crown Series, marking the culmination of a thrilling series of events that kicked off in Miami earlier this year.

programme.title: A Plea For Refuge
programme.desc: Two adventurous friends, Jeff Shapiro and Cody Tuttle, have a desire to experience one of the last, raw, and truly preserved wilderness areas on the North American continent, attempt to hike and fly paraglider's across the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge in Alaska.

programme.title: Simple Session 2024 - Highlight Show BMX
programme.desc: Simple Session was born in 2000, starting as a small-town competition, it has now blossomed into one of the world's largest and most prestigious BMX and skateboarding contests. Simple Session 24 is set on August 24-25, promising a spectacular festival!

programme.title: Nendaz Backcountry Invitational 2025 - Part 3
programme.desc: Nendaz Backcountry Invitational 2025 - Part 3

programme.title: Copa Kitely GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 - Jericoacoara (BRA)
programme.desc: The Copa Kitely GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 will take place in Jericoacoara, where the world's best wingfoilers will compete against each other. With its legendary winds, this Brazilian jewel offers ideal conditions for high-speed racing.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Dakhla (MAR) - Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 will take place in Dakhla. This Moroccan hotspot is known for its constant winds and breathtaking lagoon and offers perfect conditions for exciting freestyle performances.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Ibiraquera (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the world's best wingfoilers will meet. With its constant winds and breathtaking coastline, this Brazilian hotspot provides the perfect backdrop for exciting races.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024 – Jericoacoara (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour will electrify the coast of Jericoacoara, Brazil, with competitions in its three big air divisions - TwinTip, Hydrofoil and Surfboard. A total of 57 athletes will be competing for the world championship titles at the premiere.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 – Cauipe (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour 2024 will host the second stop of the freestyle discipline in Cauipe in north-eastern Brazil. The Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup offers intense competitions in the shallow waters.

programme.title: Swatch Catch The Moment - Profile Kassia Meador
programme.desc: "Catch the Moment" profiles athletes from around the world, including American longboard surfer Kassia Meador. Kassia is constantly exploring new creative endeavors and travels the world for surfing and photography trips.

programme.title: Copa Kitely GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 - Ibiraquera (BRA)
programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the world's best wingfoilers will meet. With its constant winds and breathtaking coastline, this Brazilian hotspot provides the perfect backdrop for exciting races.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup - Sal (CPV)
programme.desc: Sal is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the best wingfoilers in the world will meet for an exciting competition. This paradise in Cape Verde is known for its strong winds and rolling Atlantic waves.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #28: Queen & King of the Court 2025
programme.desc: The spectacular Queen & King of the Court 2025 beach volleyball event returns to Hamburg from May 23 to 25! For the fifth time in a row, the best players in the world will compete against each other in Hamburg. Level brought to life.

programme.title: Transcordilleras
programme.desc: Transcordilleras is a 1,000-kilometer self-supported bikepacking race across the Andes in Colombia. This year, the organizers offered three-stage, eight-stage, and non-stop versions of the event.

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Big Air World Championships 2022
programme.desc: In todays episode we´re going on another trip with our favorite Kite Sport Athletes. This time we are heading to Tarifa in Spain for the World first Big Air World Championships in several disciplines.

programme.title: King of the Court Crown Series 2022 - Hamburg (GER)
programme.desc: The King of the Court Crown Series 2022 will be unprecedented. Five tournaments, a total of four continents visited and millions of fans from all over the globe that can experience the best beach volleyball action ever seen!

programme.title: E-Bike World Tour 2022 - Tignes & Val d’Isère (FRA)
programme.desc: As the second stop of the 2022 E-Bike World Tour, the UCI-accredited E-Tour de Haute-Tarentaise attracted professional and experienced amateur riders from different nations for two days of sublime stage racing across 85km of high alpine terrain.

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs 2022 (ROU)
programme.desc: The Red Bull Romaniacs Extreme Enduro Rally was created in 2004 and takes place for the 19th time this year. The race is spread over five days, the first being the inner-city prologue in front of thousands of enthusiastic fans.

programme.title: FIA Championship Middle East - Saudi Baja Hall
programme.desc: The Saudi Baja is an important event in the FIA Middle East Baja Cup series. It takes place from January 30 to February 1, 2025 and serves as the opening round of the FIA World Cup for Cross-Country Bajas and the FIM Bajas World Cup.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Prologue Day
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Daily Highlights Stage #01
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E09 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 9 - England
programme.desc: SCL UK has landed in Gloucester it is workout war fitness for the ferocious, it’s going to be a a battle of the brutal, a rampage of the roofless. This is going to be a massacre of the muscles. You know it by now, but just in case you don’t, this is strongman champions league.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E10 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 10 - World's Strongest Viking
programme.desc: On the menu this week it’s medieval madness, we’ve come back to the middle ages to test our noble men through a muscle gaining of events. They are hoping and we are hoping that one will survive to take the title of the world’s strongest Viking. The official World's Strongest Viking is this time in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: This week is a good one, can you feel the energy? Sit still, just look at me and try and feel the energy, because I can tell you, the atmosphere here is electric, it’s explosive, there is a pure elemental force going through these athletes' veins. I’m shaking because it’s Poland, it’s powerful, it’s strongman champions league, and you know what I'm going to say, get ready because it’s about to get heavy.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: SCL Poland part 2 - Who will win the title in Poland and take 25 points for the world ranking. It is very exciting on the top, in part 1 between Poland and Latvia. Another great episode with super strongman events such as: Bag Toss Medley, Log Lift Reps and the Powerstairs. Also an interview with Mateusz Kieloszkowski, the all time favorite champion from Poland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: It’s time to show our strength and gain respect from the gods of Olympus. Our gladiators have many events set out by no other than Hercules himself. The coliseum is ready here on this mythological island of Cyprus, so we have landed in Limassol were again 12 Top Strongmen are battling for the title and ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E14 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 14 - South Africa
programme.desc: The only and official world championship Truckpulling for its 10th year, again at the Strongman Champions league. With the 3 times Worldchampion Kelvin de Ruiter – defending his title. This championship has trucks in all shapes and sizes which is a lot like our athletes, there all different pay loads, but does the biggest win or is it the strongest.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E15 Stage 15 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Years and years of determination has brought us here today, when all the walls felt like they were caving in perseverance. When their bodies were screaming, hurting, shouting stop, beneath. These are the things which make up a man, these are the things that bring you world finalists. This episode they fight for the greatest title of all, they fight to put their names in the history books forever.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E16 Stage 16 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Part 2 of the World Finals of the Strongman Champions League tour 2023 at the Sarajevo Centar Skenderija in Bosnia. 3 Events was done already and amazing results have been set. Who will be the new World champion? Find out here, who, after 16 stages, will be crowned World Champion 2023.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League

programme.desc: The Strongman Champions League kicks off its 2014 season in Martinique.

programme.desc: The second stage of 2014 Strongman champions League, in Cologne, Germany. 14 athletes from 12 different countries battled through six events on the second stop

programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 3, Serbia

programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 5, Holland

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 7, Portugal

programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 8, Croatia

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 9, Poland
programme.desc: SCL returns to Poland with 12 athletes all battling for the number one title

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 10, Hungary
programme.desc: The 10th stage takes place in Hungary and features new super talent!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 11, Zambia
programme.desc: The first ever SCL in Zambia! The athletes get to take in some of the stunning sights and go on to do events such as Tyre Flip and Log Lift

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 12, Romania
programme.desc: The competition moves to Romania and for the first time this season the athletes compete in rainy conditions which make the events even tougher

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 13, Lithunia
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition takes place in Lithunia and world records are once again broken!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 14, Estonia
programme.desc: Episode 14 takes place in Estonia where drama and world records will be seen again

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 15, Malaysia (World Finals Part 1)
programme.desc: Taking place over 2 days in Malaysia, this is part 1 of the world finals of Strongman Champions League!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 16, Malaysia (World Finals Part 2)
programme.desc: Who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League - we find out who is crowned as world champion today in the second part of the final epsiode

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: Across seven rivers, through mountains and forests, 12 strongmen go to toughest places to find out who is strongest Viking in the World and open a new season of Strongman champions league for 2015. Events like the Hercules Hold, Yoke Race and pulling a real Viking ship are some of the ingredients of this fantastic show.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of Strongman champions league will be hosted in Germany, by FIBO - the leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health worldwide with 300,000 visitors in four days. Special implements like the biggest log in the world or the special Bavarian stone lift are not only a challenge, but also an opportunity for new personal, national and world records.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 3, Holland
programme.desc: Holland is hosting 12 different countries with 14 of the strongest men in the world for the third stage of the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 4, Finland
programme.desc: Zydrunas Savickas, one of strongest people on earth is in this competition which has attracted the attention of the audience in the battle for the title of strongest man in Finland. The next round of SCL is in Bulgaria.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 5, Bulgaria
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition is in Bulgaria where Ervin Katona (SCL World Champion 2012) will compete for the last time.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 6, Latvia
programme.desc: Krzysztof Radzikowski, the leader in the league will fight hard to keep Dainis Zageris off from the title and to gather another 25 ranking points in this next stage in Latvia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 7, Croatia
programme.desc: The competition sees a close battle with a new world record in overhead dumbbell and close finishes throughout the day. This stage is in Croatia, in a city over 1700 years old, steeped in Roman tradition and history, the athletes arrive for the truck pull after a picturesque boat ride on the Adriatic Sea.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 8, Poland
programme.desc: We are now half way through the SCL 2015 and getting closer to the grand world finals in Turkey. The eighth stage is in Poland, the home country of the current leader Krzysztof Radzikowski.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 9, Austria
programme.desc: In this stage we go into the mountains of Austria to find out through six grueling events who is the strongest in the land of Alps. Martin Wildauer, current World Champion 2014 and Austrian local is competing alongside Zageris, Radzikowski, Belsak and many others.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 10, Romania
programme.desc: The 10th stage of this year's competition in Strongman Champions League is held in the Romanian city of Sibiu where the 12 strongmen continue to compete for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 11, World Log Lift Championship
programme.desc: The 11th stage is the SCL Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. In this championship, each competitor must lift three different weights overhead. Zydrunas Savickas is the current world record holder in the Log Lift.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 12, Lithuania
programme.desc: This next episode of the Strongman Champions League is hosted in Lithuania and sees us getting one step closer to the final.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 13, Portugal
programme.desc: The 13th stage of Strongman Champions League is in Maia, Portugal. The competition is at the “Powerexpo” – one of the best sport and fitness events in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 14, Martinique
programme.desc: This stage is in Martinique and eight strongmen from all over the world will compete for the last chance to gather points before the world grand finals in December.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 15, Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: A special World championship under the newcomers and lightweights in the Strongman world. Some of them will step from this to the heavyweights divisions.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 16, World Finals Turkey
programme.desc: After 15 outstanding competitions all over the world, finally we are here at the final competition of this year’s Strongman Champions League hosted in Turkey.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 1, Norway - World strongest Viking
programme.desc: Welcome to the land of Vikings - Norway - to the first stage of the SCL World Series 2016

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of the SCL heads to the FIBO convention, Cologne. The leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health hosts.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 3, Lithuania - Log lift World championship
programme.desc: For the third stage of SCL world series 2016, the athletes compete in Kaunas for the SCL Log Lift World Championships.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: Stage four is an epic competition and a few surprises. With 14 strongmen from all over the world, one newcomer left quite an impression.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 5, Latvia
programme.desc: This year Lauri Nami joins the starting list, back after last year's injury in Romania

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 6, Serbia
programme.desc: The SCL train stopped in Zlatibor for the stage 6 of the MLO SCL. 11 compete for the title in the home country of legendary Ervin Katona.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 7, Bulgaria
programme.desc: Bulgaria hosts the next stage of the SCL. Current leader in the World Series is Matjaz Belsak, youngest competitor and strongest man of Slovenia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 8, England
programme.desc: The competitors battle it out in the special event, the Atlas Steel Stone. This stone is made completely from iron and cannot be touched with any support.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 9, Finland
programme.desc: This stage sees the strongmen visit Vaasa, Finland. Residents here are familiar with the competition because some of the SCL icons are from their country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 10, Finland - World championship under 105 kilograms
programme.desc: 38 athletes compete in the under 90kg and under 105kg SCL World Championships. From each weight class, the top 12 qualify for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 11, Romania Part 1
programme.desc: A two day, seven event battle with lots of spectators.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 12, Romania Part 2
programme.desc: Alex Moonen is leading. Part two of the competition in Romania showcases a new challenge - Hercules Hold.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 13, Curacao
programme.desc: In this stage in Curacao no one wants to lose the chance to fight for one kilo gold in World grand finals in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 14, Portugal
programme.desc: The last chance to qualify for the World Grand Finale. Zageris and Belsak fight for the better position for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 15, Dubai World grand finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We reach Dubai where we will crown the new champion for SCL 2016. This is part one of the world finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 16, Dubai World grand finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this last episode, the best athletes compete in Pole Push, Deadlift, Forward Hold and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: We are in beautiful Norway for the kick off of the 2017 MLO Strongman Champions League season. With partly cloudy weather and lots of snow, we have the perfect scenery for the athletes, who prepare for the first contest of the year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: A definite highlight in this FIBO edition in Germany, Strongman Champions League introduced its new rules for a special team item. Graham Hicks tries here to set a New World Record on the biggest log in the world, currently held by Krzysztof Radzikowski. Boosted also by the presence of the acclaimed in the strongman circles names of Mark Felix and Danis Zageris.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 3, Lithuania
programme.desc: This weekend sees the Strongman Champions League Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. Big lifting names such as Graham Hicks , Vidas Blekaitis and Vytatus Lalas are in the startlist to push some big numbers.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: The battle of the Dutch will take place this edition in Lichtenvoorde, a place very well known in Holland because of the famous “Black Cross”. The athletes will compete over six heavy events and the winner gets 25 Strongman Champions League ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 5, Serbia
programme.desc: Set in the beautiful mountain resort Zlatibor, the fifth stage of the Strongman Champions League 2017 sees 14 athletes from across the world competing for the gold medal of SCL Serbia 2017. The event welcomes top-athlete - and odds-on favourite - Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia), who has presented himself in an impressive shape so far. Can his opponents defeat him?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 6, Canada (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next two stages take place in Quebec. With eight events over two days, SCL Canada is a true ‘heavyweight’. The athletes compete in: Truck Pull, Deadlift with cars, Log Lift, and the Atlas Stones. The World’s Strongest Viking Jean-Francois Caron from Canada is a favourite, as well as current SCL leader Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and promising underdog Jimmy Paquet (Canada).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 7, Canada (Part 2)
programme.desc: Welcome to the second day in Quebec. The athletes are fighting hard to win this two-day event. The last points of this SCL stage can be won over four outstanding disciplines: Power Stairs, Dumbbell Press, Keg Toss, and finally, the legendary Farmer’s Walk. Who will leave Canada with the yellow ‘Leader Shirt’?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stages 8 and 9 of the SCL are hosted in Vaasa, Finland, taking place over a spectacular two-day event. After 3 wins so far, Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia plans to extend his lead at the top of the table. Among the other 13 highly motivated strongmen, two SCL legends will make their comeback to the competition: Former World Champion of 2015, Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland) and Dainis Zageris (Latvia).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: The fight for the Finnish trophy continues. In this unmissable SCL event, the strongmen battle for the win in the Carry and Drag, the Forward Hold, Deadlifting with Cars and the Loading Race. Belsak, Radzikowski and Zageris look good after the first day, but the others haven’t given up yet.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 10, Finland Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: This under 105kg category event is the ultimate preparation for up-and-coming strongman athletes before entering the heavy class. The Lightweight World Championship is a special every year in the SCL calendar as it sees new talents rise and many promising athletes who are gearing up for future tournaments. A total of 25 athletes from 16 different countries make their way to Kokkola, Finland

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E11 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 11, Romania
programme.desc: Situated in the very heart of the Carpathian Mountains, Sibiu is a Romanian town where the climate is pleasantly mild, offering some of the best weather conditions for a strongman event around Europe. All this, without doubt, set the mood for the high results and showtime vibes in Stage 11 of Strongman Champions League. The competition in Sibiu was organized in six different disciplines

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E12 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 12, Curacao
programme.desc: From now on every stage of these series will be more than crucial. Curacao is a beautiful Dutch island in the Caribbean, with a great atmosphere to hold another stage of the MLO Strongman Champions League. Let’s see who takes the title here and who will secure a place in the next stage.

programme.desc: GLORY 78 is headlined by kickboxing legend Badr Hari (106-15-0, 92 KO, Morocco), who will take rising heavyweight contender Arkadiusz Wrzosek (12-5-0, 7 KO, Poland) in the main event. programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Serkan Ozcaglayan makes his GLORY premiere, a battle of the best Featherweights in the division and Nabiev takes on Troy Jones in the Welterweight division.

programme.desc: Rico Verhoeven defends his title against Jamal Ben Saddik, Gokhan Saki Returns, Maslobojev, Plazibat, Duut and more.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Headlined by the exciting and long-awaited rematch between GLORY heavyweights Jamal Ben Saddik and Benjamin Adegbuyi. Also featuring the first title defence for GLORY middleweight champion Donovan Wisse against up and comer Juri de Sousa.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Headlining the event is the highly anticipated trilogy fight between kickboxing legends Badr Hari and Alistair Overeem. In a bout over a decade in the making, Hari and Overeem will end their rivalry on the biggest stage in the sport after splitting first round knockouts with each other during the late 2000s.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The event will be headlined by an exhilarating heavyweight matchup between No. 1 ranked contender Antonio Plazibat and No. 10 ranked contender Raul Catinas. Co-headlining the event is a Welterweight Title Bout between Alim Nabiyev and Endy Semeleer. Also featured on the card, MMA veteran Joilton Lutterbach will make his GLORY debut against fellow debutant Mark Trijsburg in a welterweight bout. Top-five lightweight contender Itay Gershon will make his return to the GLORY ring against promotional newcomer Cihad Akipa. The card will also mark the return of perennial heavyweight contender Jahfarr Wilnis, who will be making his first appearance on the GLORY stage since 2019. He will meet...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Headlining the event is a Light Heavyweight Title Fight between current Champion Sergej Maslobojev and top ranked contender Donegi Abena. A Middleweight Title Bout between Champion Donovan Wisse and current number one contender Cesar Almeida will serve as the event’s co-headliner. Also featured on the card is a middleweight bout between top-five contenders Serkan Ozcaglayan and Sergej Braun. Plus, perennial lightweight contender Guerric Billet will meet Cihad Akipa. GLORY 83 will also mark the promotional debuts for both Uku Jurjendal and Nabil Khachab, who will square off against each other in a heavyweight bout. Additionally, rising featherweight contender Ahmad Chikh Mousa will look to...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Headlined by the exciting and long-awaited rematch between GLORY heavyweights Jamal Ben Saddik and Benjamin Adegbuyi. Also featuring the first title defence for GLORY middleweight champion Donovan Wisse against up and comer Juri de Sousa.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Headlining the event is the highly anticipated trilogy fight between kickboxing legends Badr Hari and Alistair Overeem. programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Lightweight Champion Tyjani Beztati will defend his Title against reigning Featherweight Champion Petch in the main event, also featured on the card is a welterweight bout between Jay Overmeer and Jamie Bates, plus a light heavyweight matchup between Nordine Mahieddine and Felipe Micheletti.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 85 will feature the four-man heavyweight tournament featuring two-time tournament finalist Jahfarr Wilnis (33-13-1, 8 KO), Heavyweight newcomer Murat Aygun (33-3-0), Nigerian giant Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (22-2-1), and ‘The Iron Bull’ Enver Sljivar (40-6, 23 KO). A kickboxing legend will also make his return on April 29 as former two-time GLORY champion Murthel Groenhart (69-25-3, 40 KO) challenges current welterweight champion Endy Semeleer (33-1, 17 KO) for the title.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: In the main event, featherweight champ Petch (168-39-3, 27 KO) looks to defend his crown for the sixth time when he welcomes the challenge of local hero Ahmad Chikh Mousa (58-8-1, 28 KO). The co-main event will see a crucial fight between Romania’s Benjamin Adegbuyi (35-8, 20 KO) and Sofian Laïdouni (35-2-1, 17 KO) of France that will decide who will qualify for the GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix in December.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Fabricio Santos De Jesus was introduced to Judo as a child while he was still living in Brazil. He was also introduced to Capoeira, becoming Champion of Brazil and International Capoeira Champion. He has been able to transfer his knowledge of the control of movement and is now recognized for this knowledge as a coach in MMA community. Hard Knocks Fighter Jess Elverum, among others, using his teachings to expand their flexibility and dexterity, becoming more fluid and calm in movement.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Josh Lee is highly respected in the MMA community for his wrestling skills. In this episode, we follow Josh throughout his day, and see some well known HK fighters who have trained under him, such as Jess Elverum. It is Josh's hope that his ability to transfer his knowledge of wrestling will make big difference in his students' fighting. He would also love to see more people take up wrestling.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Dean Schmeichel has been coaching for over 20 years. Despite the allure of working as a full time wrestling coach in the martial arts industry, he has instead dedicated himself to work with kids and coaching school sports. Wrestling continues to be an interal part of Dean's life, and he finds the most satisfaction in helping athletes to understand and fall in love with the sport, as he did.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Spartan Events is into its third year of running its hugely successful promotion, Shock N Awe. With top match making throughout the fight cards, they have been touted as some of the biggest and toughest fights in the UK. Shock N Awe consistently delivers hard hitting action, also going one step further by adding in the personalities from MC Ricky Wright, Ring Girls Poppy and Alex and as well as the huge UK fight teams!

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Ultimate Warrior Challenge is one of Europe's leading MMA shows, since it's inception in 2006 it's has grown steadily and delivered some of the most exciting MMA fights Europe has seen, with a truly Internationalfight roster, UWC has built a solid reputation for bringing some of the Worlds toughest fighters to square off in the UWC octagon, fighters from the UK, USA, Brazil, Sweden, Italy, Africa, Poland, France, Cyprus, Greece have all fought in the UWC cage.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Fabricio Santos De Jesus was introduced to Judo as a child while he was still living in Brazil. He was also introduced to Capoeira, becoming Champion of Brazil and International Capoeira Champion. He has been able to transfer his knowledge of the control of movement and is now recognized for this knowledge as a coach in MMA community. Hard Knocks Fighter Jess Elverum, among others, using his teachings to expand their flexibility and dexterity, becoming more fluid and calm in movement.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Josh Lee is highly respected in the MMA community for his wrestling skills. In this episode, we follow Josh throughout his day, and see some well known HK fighters who have trained under him, such as Jess Elverum. It is Josh's hope that his ability to transfer his knowledge of wrestling will make big difference in his students' fighting. He would also love to see more people take up wrestling.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E20 Jodha Akbar S3 E20
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Second Chances

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E25 Jodha Akbar S3 E25
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: Lies Hidden in My Garden

programme.title: Playful Kiss

programme.title: Playful Kiss

programme.title: Playful Kiss

programme.title: Playful Kiss
programme.desc: Ha Ni studies hard for the test to change her major, which determines their marriage registeration.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Picking up moments after the launch of the tactical nuclear weapons, the team is split up trying to outrun the impending blast. Citizen Z finds himself battling thawed zombies, ultimately issuing an on-air bounty for Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Each member of the group goes through a near-death experience while being attacked by bounty hunters. Mack is bitten after being caught in a zombie-infested stairwell.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After finally tracking down Murphy, the group comes across a caravan of survivors transporting victims of the nuclear blast to safety. Along the way, the mission is attacked by "blasters," zombies mutated by the radioactive fallout.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: On the quest for a cure for the virus, the group makes its way to the greenhouse where Batch 47 is being grown by Odegard. There, Odegard warns them about zombie-plant hybrids.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy's past comes back to haunt him when Serena tracks him down. The team stumbles upon a hidden farm.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While crossing the Mississippi River, the group is involved in an accident and 10K is separated. At a nearby settlement, 10K and some new friends run into trouble with the settlement's leader, Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Tricked into a trap by use of a fresh brain lure, Murphy is captured by a zombie fan known as "The Collector."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near Roswell, New Mexico, the group encounters a community, led by a woman called Bernadette, which they believe is above a secret underground base that may contain useful equipment.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy, Warren, Vasquez and Addy find themselves at a casino while 10K and Doc are captured by Natives.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near the Mexican border, the group is rescued from a zombie hoard by Escorpion, who leads them to La Reina, the "Queen of the Dead." As a bounty for Murphy, La Reina offers them a reward or a free pass to join her group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose when it's discovered that not only does Dr. Kurian's vaccine not work but everyone who was injected will come under Murphy's control after an incubation period.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team finally arrives in California. As they near their goal, each member thinks back to where they were at the beginning of the apocalypse and what it took to get where they are today.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, the team drives through the abandoned city to the coordinates of the mobile CDC lab provided by Citizen Z. There, they discover the lab isn't just a lab - it's a submarine.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 2.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group are taken prisoner while Murphy manages to escape with his newly formed group of blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While on the road to establish his headquarters in Spokane, Murphy saves the life of a dying girl. When her parents show up and ask to be bitten too, his mission gains momentum. Meanwhile, Warren leads the new mission group to a strange town.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: As more people flock to Murphy's new cult, Dr. Merch works on a blend vaccine as well as a booster shot to slow to Murphy's descent into zombiedom.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc finds himself taken captive by a psychotic nurse and her surviving mental patients, and he later discovers that 10K is being held too.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Seemingly injected with the blend vaccine, The Man attempts to kidnap Murphy but underestimates the strength of Murphy's followers. However, he does manage to learn about Lucy's existence. 10K reunites with the group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Looking for Lucy, Doc and Addy run into Skeezy and Sketch, who is running for "President of the Apocalypse."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the others inspect Murphytown and realize they are going to need a bigger army to extract Murphy. Warren finds an old ally in El Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc tries to find a way to tell Warren about Lucy's kidnapping. In the meantime, he encounters a radio tower and castle-like compound inhabited by three attractive, crafty ladies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren leads an attack against Murphytown to extract its smug leader.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy is being pummeled with whatever The Man can throw at her - and Lucy does the same right back.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy and Doc catch up with Warren, but the reunion is short-lived as the group faces the biggest battle yet.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Driven by her dream of a black rainbow and flesh-eating rain, Warren and Murphy escape Zona, while Doc, 10K and Sarge are pinned down by snipers.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When Sun Mei and Red vanish, the group must decide whether to keep looking for them or press on to Newmerica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following Warren's dream, the team doesn't stop while crossing the Great Pile, a seemingly endless landscape of rubble and destruction.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team is captured and enslaved in an elaborate underground facility, forced by their mysterious captors to perform a series of bizarre and dangerous tasks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lucy fights to save Murphy's life, while Warren and the others battle a biologically modified zombie.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group encounter a mysterious stranger who they think is a grave robber - but turns out to be something much more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group explores an abandoned TV station while seeking a way to contact Kaya, who is attempting to hide from an invasion of Zona forces at camp Northern Light. Citizen Z returns home after two years.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Chicago, Doc and Murphy encounter a mysterious - and murderous - group, including Sketchy and Skeezy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group returns to Mercy Labs, where they first met The Man, to retrieve another item from Warren's dreams.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the mind-bending season finale, the team arrives in Washington, D.C. and the secret of Warren's dreams is revealed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following the drone crash, Warren is nursed back to health by attractive homesteader Cooper. Meanwhile, the others finally reach Newmerica, and Murphy goes his own way.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the outpost Altura, 10K searches for Red, Warren discovers George is an old friend, Murphy encounters Sun Mei in her new lab and Doc runs into Citizen Z.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Panic and anti-talker sentiments flare after an explosion derails the vote - and rumors blame a talker. 10K, Sarge and Red are attacked by old-school zombies and suffer devastating losses, and Murphy finds his loyal blends are still out there.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A new spate of terrorist bombings hit Pacifica. In order to follow his vision for human-talker unity, George seeks those responsible for the attacks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group wind up at a wild casino and shelter for fugitive talkers run by Murphy and his blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc breaks out special medicine to treat George's injury and explains the Founding Fathers, the Bill of Rights and more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group arrives at the farming outpost that produces flour for Z-bizkuits, but it is overrun by zombies, Pandora and starving talkers laying in wait to kill them.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group discovers Altura militia forces have enslaved talkers to mine hazardous waste for Z-bizkuits.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: With help from renegade hackers, Warren and George hack Altura's defenses and discover Estes' secret plan.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Estes imprisons the captive talkers and blends, while Warren and George plan their attack on Altura.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren works with humans, talkers and blends to help George defeat Estes and Pandora. Newmericans can finally vote, but before Warren can relax, Cooper reappears with a shocking revelation.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of gas, the team follows a suspicious stranger to a damaged oil refinery deep inside a New Jersey no-go zone packed with zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Out to get Cassandra back, her bizarre and dangerous "family" of cannibals catches up with the team and kidnaps Addy, endangering the mission.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Citizen Z directs the team to a rumored helicopter controlled by a mysterious general living atop a heavily guarded skyscraper - where zombies roam freely.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A tornado forces the team to Warren's hometown, where she searches for her husband who she lost track of in the early days of the apocalypse.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lost and out of water in rural Kansas, the team is on the verge of breaking up before arriving at a Wild West-style bar. Guns, liquor and a zombie-shooting contest: what could go wrong?

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When the last surviving cosmonaut from the International Space Station crashes on Earth, Citizen Z gets a real, live buddy - but it quickly becomes clear that his new friend has a secret agenda.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Split off from the others, Mack and Addy find themselves trapped by a zombie they just can't kill. A series of escalating fights forces them to confront an ugly truth hidden in their past.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While in South Dakota, an imminent meltdown forces the team to help the locals repair a nearby nuclear power plant full of radiated zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Some strangers earn their ways into the team, taking a keen interest in Murphy, but things take a deadly turn.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A change in plans has the team re-routed to a Colorado viral lab located in a nuclear missile silo. The team searches for Dr. Merch, the developer of the experimental vaccine previously given to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy's past comes back to haunt him when Serena tracks him down. The team stumbles upon a hidden farm.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy separates from the group out of fear that they may take the baby away - and kill her. Vasquez and Warren are injured and wind up in an abandoned hospital. 10K is forced to make a tragic decision during a conflict with Cassandra.

programme.desc: The group becomes embroiled in corporate politics while seeking shelter at a hotel overtaken by white-collar survivors. There, Murphy is hunted.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Alone and suffering from the effects of Merch's booster, 10K barely escapes Murphy and is stalked by a blend.
